DIVISION OF EDUCATION
W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION
250 CHAMPION STREET
BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
MAURICE F. SEAY
DIRECTOR
PHONE WO 8-8118
October 1, 1959
Dr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
**Mo
1959

Dear Harry:
No, we do not make the kind of grant which you described
in your letter of September 30. Many times we have had similar
requests, so we have definitely established a policy--and it’s
a negative one as far as you are concerned.
But I do hope you get to make that trip. You are the one
to represent us and it would be a fine experience.
Thanks for your friendly and frank letter and don’t ever
have any more that feeling of "a little shame-facedly."
Sincerely and with best wishes.
Maurice F. Seay
MFS/jmd
